# Subgroups generated by elements of a group

```agda
module group-theory.subgroups-generated-by-elements-groupsᵉ where
```

<details><summary>Imports</summary>

```agda
open import elementary-number-theory.group-of-integersᵉ
open import elementary-number-theory.integersᵉ

open import foundation.dependent-pair-typesᵉ
open import foundation.function-typesᵉ
open import foundation.identity-typesᵉ
open import foundation.images-subtypesᵉ
open import foundation.logical-equivalencesᵉ
open import foundation.singleton-subtypesᵉ
open import foundation.subtypesᵉ
open import foundation.universe-levelsᵉ

open import group-theory.free-groups-with-one-generatorᵉ
open import group-theory.groupsᵉ
open import group-theory.homomorphisms-groupsᵉ
open import group-theory.images-of-group-homomorphismsᵉ
open import group-theory.integer-powers-of-elements-groupsᵉ
open import group-theory.subgroupsᵉ
open import group-theory.subgroups-generated-by-subsets-groupsᵉ
open import group-theory.subsets-groupsᵉ
open import group-theory.trivial-subgroupsᵉ
```

</details>

## Idea

Theᵉ **subgroupᵉ generatedᵉ byᵉ anᵉ element**ᵉ `x`ᵉ ofᵉ aᵉ
[group](group-theory.groups.mdᵉ) `G`ᵉ isᵉ theᵉ
[subgroupᵉ generatedᵉ by](group-theory.subgroups-generated-by-subsets-groups.mdᵉ)
theᵉ [standardᵉ singletonᵉ subset](foundation.singleton-subtypes.mdᵉ) `{x}`.ᵉ Inᵉ
otherᵉ words,ᵉ itᵉ isᵉ theᵉ leastᵉ [subgroup](group-theory.subgroups.mdᵉ) ofᵉ `G`ᵉ thatᵉ
containsᵉ theᵉ elementᵉ `x`.ᵉ Inᵉ informalᵉ writing,ᵉ theᵉ subgroupᵉ generatedᵉ byᵉ `x`ᵉ isᵉ
denotedᵉ byᵉ `⟨x⟩`.ᵉ

## Definitions

### The predicate of being a subgroup generated by an element

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ : Level} (Gᵉ : Groupᵉ l1ᵉ) (xᵉ : type-Groupᵉ Gᵉ)
  where

  is-subgroup-generated-by-element-Groupᵉ :
    {l2ᵉ : Level} (Hᵉ : Subgroupᵉ l2ᵉ Gᵉ) → UUωᵉ
  is-subgroup-generated-by-element-Groupᵉ Hᵉ =
    {lᵉ : Level} (Kᵉ : Subgroupᵉ lᵉ Gᵉ) → is-in-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ Kᵉ xᵉ ↔ᵉ leq-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ Kᵉ

  contains-element-is-subgroup-generated-by-element-Groupᵉ :
    {l2ᵉ : Level} (Hᵉ : Subgroupᵉ l2ᵉ Gᵉ) →
    is-subgroup-generated-by-element-Groupᵉ Hᵉ →
    is-in-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ xᵉ
  contains-element-is-subgroup-generated-by-element-Groupᵉ Hᵉ αᵉ =
    backward-implicationᵉ (αᵉ Hᵉ) (refl-leq-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ)

  leq-subgroup-is-subgroup-generated-by-element-Groupᵉ :
    {l2ᵉ l3ᵉ : Level} (Hᵉ : Subgroupᵉ l2ᵉ Gᵉ) (Kᵉ : Subgroupᵉ l3ᵉ Gᵉ) →
    is-subgroup-generated-by-element-Groupᵉ Hᵉ →
    is-in-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ Kᵉ xᵉ → leq-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ Kᵉ
  leq-subgroup-is-subgroup-generated-by-element-Groupᵉ Hᵉ Kᵉ αᵉ =
    forward-implicationᵉ (αᵉ Kᵉ)
```

### The subgroup generated by an element of a group

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ : Level} (Gᵉ : Groupᵉ l1ᵉ) (xᵉ : type-Groupᵉ Gᵉ)
  where

  generating-subset-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ : subset-Groupᵉ l1ᵉ Gᵉ
  generating-subset-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ =
    subtype-standard-singleton-subtypeᵉ (set-Groupᵉ Gᵉ) xᵉ

  subgroup-element-Groupᵉ : Subgroupᵉ l1ᵉ Gᵉ
  subgroup-element-Groupᵉ =
    subgroup-subset-Groupᵉ Gᵉ generating-subset-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ

  subset-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ : subset-Groupᵉ l1ᵉ Gᵉ
  subset-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ = subset-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ subgroup-element-Groupᵉ

  is-in-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ : type-Groupᵉ Gᵉ → UUᵉ l1ᵉ
  is-in-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ = is-in-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ subgroup-element-Groupᵉ

  is-closed-under-eq-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ :
    {yᵉ zᵉ : type-Groupᵉ Gᵉ} → is-in-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ yᵉ →
    yᵉ ＝ᵉ zᵉ → is-in-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ zᵉ
  is-closed-under-eq-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ =
    is-closed-under-eq-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ subgroup-element-Groupᵉ

  is-closed-under-eq-subgroup-element-Group'ᵉ :
    {yᵉ zᵉ : type-Groupᵉ Gᵉ} → is-in-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ zᵉ →
    yᵉ ＝ᵉ zᵉ → is-in-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ yᵉ
  is-closed-under-eq-subgroup-element-Group'ᵉ =
    is-closed-under-eq-Subgroup'ᵉ Gᵉ subgroup-element-Groupᵉ

  contains-unit-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ :
    contains-unit-subset-Groupᵉ Gᵉ subset-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ
  contains-unit-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ =
    contains-unit-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ subgroup-element-Groupᵉ

  is-closed-under-multiplication-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ :
    is-closed-under-multiplication-subset-Groupᵉ Gᵉ subset-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ
  is-closed-under-multiplication-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ =
    is-closed-under-multiplication-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ subgroup-element-Groupᵉ

  is-closed-under-inverses-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ :
    is-closed-under-inverses-subset-Groupᵉ Gᵉ subset-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ
  is-closed-under-inverses-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ =
    is-closed-under-inverses-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ subgroup-element-Groupᵉ

  abstract
    is-subgroup-generated-by-element-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ :
      is-subgroup-generated-by-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ subgroup-element-Groupᵉ
    is-subgroup-generated-by-element-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Hᵉ =
      logical-equivalence-reasoningᵉ
        is-in-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ xᵉ
        ↔ᵉ ( subtype-standard-singleton-subtypeᵉ (set-Groupᵉ Gᵉ) xᵉ ⊆ᵉ
            subset-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ)
          byᵉ
          inv-iffᵉ
            ( is-least-subtype-containing-element-Setᵉ
              ( set-Groupᵉ Gᵉ)
              ( xᵉ)
              ( subset-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ))
        ↔ᵉ leq-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Hᵉ
          byᵉ
          inv-iffᵉ
            ( is-subgroup-generated-by-subset-subgroup-subset-Groupᵉ Gᵉ
              ( subtype-standard-singleton-subtypeᵉ (set-Groupᵉ Gᵉ) xᵉ)
              ( Hᵉ))

  abstract
    contains-element-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ :
      is-in-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ xᵉ
    contains-element-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ =
      contains-subset-subgroup-subset-Groupᵉ Gᵉ
        ( subtype-standard-singleton-subtypeᵉ (set-Groupᵉ Gᵉ) xᵉ)
        ( xᵉ)
        ( reflᵉ)

  abstract
    leq-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ :
      {lᵉ : Level} (Hᵉ : Subgroupᵉ lᵉ Gᵉ) →
      is-in-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ xᵉ → leq-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Hᵉ
    leq-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Hᵉ =
      forward-implicationᵉ
        ( is-subgroup-generated-by-element-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Hᵉ)
```

### The image of the initial group homomorphism `f : ℤ → G` such that `f(1) ＝ g`

Anᵉ alternativeᵉ definitionᵉ ofᵉ theᵉ subgroupᵉ generatedᵉ byᵉ oneᵉ elementᵉ `g`ᵉ isᵉ asᵉ theᵉ
imageᵉ ofᵉ theᵉ
[initialᵉ groupᵉ homomorphism](group-theory.free-groups-with-one-generator.mdᵉ)
`fᵉ : ℤᵉ → G`ᵉ thatᵉ satisfiesᵉ `f(1ᵉ) ＝ᵉ g`.ᵉ

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ : Level} (Gᵉ : Groupᵉ l1ᵉ) (xᵉ : type-Groupᵉ Gᵉ)
  where

  image-hom-element-Groupᵉ : Subgroupᵉ l1ᵉ Gᵉ
  image-hom-element-Groupᵉ = image-hom-Groupᵉ ℤ-Groupᵉ Gᵉ (hom-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ)

  subset-image-hom-element-Groupᵉ : subset-Groupᵉ l1ᵉ Gᵉ
  subset-image-hom-element-Groupᵉ =
    subset-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ image-hom-element-Groupᵉ

  is-in-image-hom-element-Groupᵉ : type-Groupᵉ Gᵉ → UUᵉ l1ᵉ
  is-in-image-hom-element-Groupᵉ = is-in-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ image-hom-element-Groupᵉ

  is-closed-under-eq-image-hom-element-Groupᵉ :
    {yᵉ zᵉ : type-Groupᵉ Gᵉ} → is-in-image-hom-element-Groupᵉ yᵉ →
    yᵉ ＝ᵉ zᵉ → is-in-image-hom-element-Groupᵉ zᵉ
  is-closed-under-eq-image-hom-element-Groupᵉ =
    is-closed-under-eq-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ image-hom-element-Groupᵉ

  is-closed-under-eq-image-hom-element-Group'ᵉ :
    {yᵉ zᵉ : type-Groupᵉ Gᵉ} → is-in-image-hom-element-Groupᵉ zᵉ →
    yᵉ ＝ᵉ zᵉ → is-in-image-hom-element-Groupᵉ yᵉ
  is-closed-under-eq-image-hom-element-Group'ᵉ =
    is-closed-under-eq-Subgroup'ᵉ Gᵉ image-hom-element-Groupᵉ

  is-image-image-hom-element-Groupᵉ :
    is-image-hom-Groupᵉ ℤ-Groupᵉ Gᵉ (hom-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ) image-hom-element-Groupᵉ
  is-image-image-hom-element-Groupᵉ =
    is-image-image-hom-Groupᵉ ℤ-Groupᵉ Gᵉ (hom-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ)

  contains-values-image-hom-element-Groupᵉ :
    (kᵉ : ℤᵉ) → is-in-image-hom-element-Groupᵉ (map-hom-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ kᵉ)
  contains-values-image-hom-element-Groupᵉ =
    contains-values-image-hom-Groupᵉ ℤ-Groupᵉ Gᵉ (hom-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ)

  contains-element-image-hom-element-Groupᵉ :
    is-in-image-hom-element-Groupᵉ xᵉ
  contains-element-image-hom-element-Groupᵉ =
    is-closed-under-eq-image-hom-element-Groupᵉ
      ( contains-values-image-hom-element-Groupᵉ one-ℤᵉ)
      ( right-unit-law-mul-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ)

  leq-image-hom-element-Groupᵉ :
    {lᵉ : Level} (Hᵉ : Subgroupᵉ lᵉ Gᵉ) →
    is-in-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ xᵉ → leq-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ image-hom-element-Groupᵉ Hᵉ
  leq-image-hom-element-Groupᵉ Hᵉ uᵉ =
    leq-image-hom-Groupᵉ
      ( ℤ-Groupᵉ)
      ( Gᵉ)
      ( hom-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ)
      ( Hᵉ)
      ( λ kᵉ → is-closed-under-powers-int-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ kᵉ xᵉ uᵉ)

  is-subgroup-generated-by-element-image-hom-element-Groupᵉ :
    is-subgroup-generated-by-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ image-hom-element-Groupᵉ
  pr1ᵉ (is-subgroup-generated-by-element-image-hom-element-Groupᵉ Kᵉ) =
    leq-image-hom-element-Groupᵉ Kᵉ
  pr2ᵉ (is-subgroup-generated-by-element-image-hom-element-Groupᵉ Kᵉ) uᵉ =
    uᵉ xᵉ contains-element-image-hom-element-Groupᵉ
```

## Properties

### The subgroup generated by an element `g` contains all the integer powers `gᵏ`

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ : Level} (Gᵉ : Groupᵉ l1ᵉ) (xᵉ : type-Groupᵉ Gᵉ)
  where

  contains-powers-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ :
    (kᵉ : ℤᵉ) → is-in-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ (integer-power-Groupᵉ Gᵉ kᵉ xᵉ)
  contains-powers-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ kᵉ =
    is-closed-under-powers-int-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ
      ( subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ)
      ( kᵉ)
      ( xᵉ)
      ( contains-element-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ)
```

### Any two subgroups generated by the same element contain the same elements

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ l2ᵉ l3ᵉ : Level} (Gᵉ : Groupᵉ l1ᵉ) (xᵉ : type-Groupᵉ Gᵉ)
  (Hᵉ : Subgroupᵉ l2ᵉ Gᵉ) (Huᵉ : is-subgroup-generated-by-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ Hᵉ)
  (Kᵉ : Subgroupᵉ l3ᵉ Gᵉ) (Kuᵉ : is-subgroup-generated-by-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ Kᵉ)
  where

  has-same-elements-is-subgroup-generated-by-element-Groupᵉ :
    has-same-elements-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ Kᵉ
  pr1ᵉ (has-same-elements-is-subgroup-generated-by-element-Groupᵉ yᵉ) =
    leq-subgroup-is-subgroup-generated-by-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ Hᵉ Kᵉ Huᵉ
      ( contains-element-is-subgroup-generated-by-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ Kᵉ Kuᵉ)
      ( yᵉ)
  pr2ᵉ (has-same-elements-is-subgroup-generated-by-element-Groupᵉ yᵉ) =
    leq-subgroup-is-subgroup-generated-by-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ Kᵉ Hᵉ Kuᵉ
      ( contains-element-is-subgroup-generated-by-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ Hᵉ Huᵉ)
      ( yᵉ)
```

### Any subgroup that has the same elements as the subgroup generated by `x` satisfies the universal property of the subgroup generated by `x`

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ l2ᵉ : Level} (Gᵉ : Groupᵉ l1ᵉ) (xᵉ : type-Groupᵉ Gᵉ) (Hᵉ : Subgroupᵉ l2ᵉ Gᵉ)
  where

  is-subgroup-generated-by-element-has-same-elements-Subgroupᵉ :
    has-same-elements-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ (subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ) Hᵉ →
    is-subgroup-generated-by-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ Hᵉ
  pr1ᵉ (is-subgroup-generated-by-element-has-same-elements-Subgroupᵉ pᵉ Uᵉ) uᵉ =
    transitive-leq-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ (subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ) Uᵉ
      ( forward-implicationᵉ
        ( is-subgroup-generated-by-element-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ Uᵉ)
        ( uᵉ))
      ( leq-has-same-elements-Subgroup'ᵉ Gᵉ (subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ) Hᵉ pᵉ)
  pr2ᵉ (is-subgroup-generated-by-element-has-same-elements-Subgroupᵉ pᵉ Uᵉ) qᵉ =
    qᵉ xᵉ
      ( forward-implicationᵉ (pᵉ xᵉ) (contains-element-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ))
```

### The subgroup generated by an element has the same elements as the image of the intial group homomorphism `ℤ → G` mapping `1` to `g`

```agda
module _
  {lᵉ : Level} (Gᵉ : Groupᵉ lᵉ) (xᵉ : type-Groupᵉ Gᵉ)
  where

  has-same-elements-image-hom-element-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ :
    has-same-elements-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ
      ( image-hom-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ)
      ( subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ)
  has-same-elements-image-hom-element-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ =
    has-same-elements-is-subgroup-generated-by-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ
      ( image-hom-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ)
      ( is-subgroup-generated-by-element-image-hom-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ)
      ( subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ)
      ( is-subgroup-generated-by-element-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ)
```

### The image of the subgroup `⟨x⟩` generated by `x` under a group homomorphism `f` is the subgroup `⟨f(x)⟩` generated by the element `f(x)`

Thereᵉ areᵉ threeᵉ waysᵉ to stateᵉ thisᵉ factᵉ:

1.ᵉ Theᵉ imageᵉ ofᵉ theᵉ subgroupᵉ `⟨x⟩`ᵉ underᵉ theᵉ groupᵉ homomorphismᵉ `f`ᵉ hasᵉ theᵉ sameᵉ
   elementsᵉ asᵉ theᵉ subgroupᵉ `⟨f(x)⟩`.ᵉ
2.ᵉ Theᵉ subgroupᵉ `⟨f(x)⟩`ᵉ satisfiesᵉ theᵉ universalᵉ propertyᵉ ofᵉ theᵉ imageᵉ ofᵉ theᵉ
   groupᵉ `⟨x⟩`ᵉ underᵉ theᵉ groupᵉ homomorphismᵉ `f`.ᵉ
3.ᵉ Theᵉ imageᵉ ofᵉ theᵉ subgroupᵉ `⟨x⟩`ᵉ underᵉ theᵉ groupᵉ homomorphismᵉ `f`ᵉ satisfiesᵉ
   theᵉ universalᵉ propertyᵉ ofᵉ theᵉ subgroupᵉ generatedᵉ byᵉ theᵉ elementᵉ `fᵉ x`.ᵉ

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ l2ᵉ : Level} (Gᵉ : Groupᵉ l1ᵉ) (Hᵉ : Groupᵉ l2ᵉ) (fᵉ : hom-Groupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ)
  (xᵉ : type-Groupᵉ Gᵉ)
  where

  compute-image-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ :
    has-same-elements-Subgroupᵉ Hᵉ
      ( im-hom-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ fᵉ (subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ))
      ( subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Hᵉ (map-hom-Groupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ fᵉ xᵉ))
  compute-image-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ hᵉ =
    logical-equivalence-reasoningᵉ
      is-in-im-hom-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ fᵉ (subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ) hᵉ
      ↔ᵉ is-in-subgroup-subset-Groupᵉ Hᵉ
          ( im-subtypeᵉ
            ( map-hom-Groupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ fᵉ)
            ( subtype-standard-singleton-subtypeᵉ (set-Groupᵉ Gᵉ) xᵉ))
          ( hᵉ)
        byᵉ
        compute-image-subgroup-subset-Groupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ fᵉ
          ( subtype-standard-singleton-subtypeᵉ (set-Groupᵉ Gᵉ) xᵉ)
          ( hᵉ)
      ↔ᵉ is-in-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Hᵉ (map-hom-Groupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ fᵉ xᵉ) hᵉ
        byᵉ
        inv-iffᵉ
          ( has-same-elements-subgroup-subset-has-same-elements-subset-Groupᵉ Hᵉ
            ( generating-subset-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Hᵉ _)
            ( im-subtypeᵉ
              ( map-hom-Groupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ fᵉ)
              ( subtype-standard-singleton-subtypeᵉ (set-Groupᵉ Gᵉ) xᵉ))
            ( compute-im-singleton-subtypeᵉ
              ( set-Groupᵉ Gᵉ)
              ( set-Groupᵉ Hᵉ)
              ( map-hom-Groupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ fᵉ)
              ( xᵉ))
            ( hᵉ))

  is-image-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ :
    is-image-subgroup-hom-Groupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ fᵉ
      ( subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ)
      ( subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Hᵉ (map-hom-Groupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ fᵉ xᵉ))
  is-image-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ =
    is-image-subgroup-has-same-elements-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ fᵉ
      ( subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ)
      ( subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Hᵉ (map-hom-Groupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ fᵉ xᵉ))
      ( compute-image-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ)

  is-subgroup-generated-by-element-image-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ :
    is-subgroup-generated-by-element-Groupᵉ Hᵉ
      ( map-hom-Groupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ fᵉ xᵉ)
      ( im-hom-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ fᵉ (subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ))
  is-subgroup-generated-by-element-image-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ =
    is-subgroup-generated-by-element-has-same-elements-Subgroupᵉ Hᵉ
      ( map-hom-Groupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ fᵉ xᵉ)
      ( im-hom-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ Hᵉ fᵉ (subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ))
      ( inv-iffᵉ ∘ᵉ compute-image-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ)
```

### The subgroup `⟨x⟩` is trivial if and only if `unit-Group G ＝ x`

```agda
module _
  {l1ᵉ : Level} (Gᵉ : Groupᵉ l1ᵉ)
  where

  is-trivial-subgroup-unit-Groupᵉ :
    is-trivial-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ (subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ (unit-Groupᵉ Gᵉ))
  is-trivial-subgroup-unit-Groupᵉ =
    leq-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ (unit-Groupᵉ Gᵉ) (trivial-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ) reflᵉ

  is-trivial-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ :
    (xᵉ : type-Groupᵉ Gᵉ) →
    is-unit-Group'ᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ → is-trivial-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ (subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ)
  is-trivial-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ ._ reflᵉ = is-trivial-subgroup-unit-Groupᵉ

  is-unit-is-trivial-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ :
    (xᵉ : type-Groupᵉ Gᵉ) →
    is-trivial-Subgroupᵉ Gᵉ (subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ) → is-unit-Group'ᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ
  is-unit-is-trivial-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ xᵉ Hᵉ =
    Hᵉ xᵉ (contains-element-subgroup-element-Groupᵉ Gᵉ xᵉ)
```
